long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small tool for ServiceNow.
Move the current form or list to the ServiceNow frame (with menus "All", "Favorites", "History", etc.).
Access the list of the current table with a button.
Available for U16 and Next Experience UI.
